title: Split a Check at Dinner
description: A table of four guests asks their server to split the check evenly between them.

tasks.description: Retrieve the table's order from the POS system.
tasks.expected_outcome: The server pulls up the correct check.

tasks.description: Use the 'Split Check' function in the POS to divide the total by four.
tasks.expected_outcome: The system correctly calculates the amount due for each person.

tasks.description: Process each of the four payments separately.
tasks.expected_outcome: The server successfully processes four separate credit card payments.
